Package swinghelper

Class TabPlacement

java.lang.Object
swinghelper.WindowFinder
swinghelper.SwingManager
swinghelper.TabPlacement
public class TabPlacement
extends SwingManager
Adds the processing content to a tab as well as other content to other tabs. The tab name of the tab with the processing content can be altered in Settings.
Author:
NumericPrime

  • Field Details

    • standart

      public static TabPlacement standart

    • stn

      public java.lang.String stn
      The tab name for the processing content is stored here. Editing it will have no effect.
      Specify it in Settings or if you have autoMerge disabled you can also use it as a constructor argument.

    • jtp

      public javax.swing.JTabbedPane jtp

  • Constructor Details

    • TabPlacement

      public TabPlacement()

    • TabPlacement

      public TabPlacement​(java.lang.String st)
      You can use this constructor to add a custom name for the tab with the processing content. If autoMerge from Settings is turned off.
